name: Crash Wind Prototype-1
description:
Explore the best view of racing game with crash wind.

The Game has the various maps and cars for you to explore and experience those  adventures.

Controls:-

1. (W,A,S and D) keys for movement of car.

2. (Press C) for switching camera from follow cam to Top-down and vice versa.

3. If player car get out of the track then we can (press R) to relocate to nearest      checkpoint of the track.
